alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lexington County through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Batesburg-Leesville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Red Bank, South Congaree, Gaston, Pelion, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Peachtree Rock, Edmund, Barr Lake, Samaria Fire Station, Red Bank Sports Complex, Cedar Pond Campground, and Camp Kinard. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 39 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
